definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The application of chemical oil displacement agents for high temperature and salinity reservoir was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 分析了高温高盐油藏用化学驱油剂的应用前景。

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: These materials are found capable of withstanding high temperature and high pressure.
sentences.chinese: 发现这些材料能承受高温高压。

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
sentences.chinese: 简述了水性高温防腐涂料的制备工艺及主要性能。

sentences.english: That is it. So you want high temperature bricks, what are you going to make them out of?
sentences.chinese: 这就是它，因此你想要高温砖，你打算怎么做它？

sentences.english: The mechanism of high temperature creep associated with the climb of extended dislocations is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了扩展位错攀移的高温蠕变机制。

sentences.english: The diapause of housefly larvae can be terminated by high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 高温可解除家蝇幼虫的滞育。

sentences.english: In addition, high temperature, continuous wave operation of the laser has also been achieved.
sentences.chinese: 此外，高温，连续波运行的设计目标也已达到。

sentences.english: After it is available, I am denied for the access to Bikram Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 它是可用后，我被剥夺了对高温瑜伽访问。

sentences.english: Hot-water hoses must be reinforced to withstand high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 热水管必须能承受高温。

sentences.english: Then they bake it in an extremely hot oven.
sentences.chinese: 最后将它置入高温炉里烘焙。

sentences.english: The secret, Palumbi said, may be that the high temperatures last for a short period of time.
sentences.chinese: 帕卢比说，奥秘可能在于高温只持续了很短一段时间。

sentences.english: The high temperature valve is suitable for sealing high-temperature pipelines in the production process of titanium sponge.
sentences.chinese: 适用作海绵钛生产过程中密封高温管道使用。

sentences.english: High temperature rated grease is standard for extended bearing life.
sentences.chinese: 高温润滑脂是标准的额定延长轴承寿命。

sentences.english: The room and high temperature mechanical strength of the hot-pressed B4C ceramic are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了热压烧结B4C陶瓷的室温和高温力学强度。

sentences.english: In this project, properties of transition-metal silicides were investigated for structural as well as functional applications.
sentences.chinese: 研究金属硅化物的高温结构性能和功能特性。

definition: (of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
